PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-07752012-06-07,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectCanadian Broadcasting Corporation
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2003-358 of March 21, 2003; and (2) authorizing the CANADIAN BROADCASTING CORPORATION to adjust its international service to current broadcast realities by focusing on the Internet as a means of distribution.
AttachmentsAttachment
